001package io.github.ai4ci.config.setup;
002
003import org.immutables.value.Value;
004
005import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnore;
006import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.annotation.JsonDeserialize;
007import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.annotation.JsonSerialize;
008
009import io.github.ai4ci.abm.ModifiablePerson;
010import io.github.ai4ci.abm.Outbreak;
011import io.github.ai4ci.abm.Person;
012import io.github.ai4ci.functions.Distribution;
013import io.github.ai4ci.functions.SimpleDistribution;
014import io.github.ai4ci.util.Sampler;
015
016/**
017 * Simple unstratified demographic configuration.
018 *
019 * <p>
020 * This implementation provides a minimal demographic model where relationship
021 * strengths are drawn from a single distribution and no stratification (for
022 * example by age or location) is applied. It is useful for tests and simple
023 * experiments where demographic detail is not required.
024 *
025 * <p>
026 * Downstream users include setup and baselining code which may call
027 * {@link #createPersonStub} to construct simple person stubs and
028 * {@link #getRelationshipStrength} to obtain perâ€‘pair contact modifiers.
029 *
030 * <p>
031 * Extension guidance: for richer demographies prefer
032 * {@link AgeStratifiedDemography} or {@link LocationAwareDemography}.
033 *
034 * @author Rob Challen
035 */
036@Value.Immutable
037@JsonSerialize(as = ImmutableUnstratifiedDemography.class)
038@JsonDeserialize(as = ImmutableUnstratifiedDemography.class)
039public interface UnstratifiedDemography extends DemographicConfiguration {
040
041        /**
042         * A sensible default instance for tests and examples.
043         */
044        ImmutableUnstratifiedDemography DEFAULT = ImmutableUnstratifiedDemography
045                        .builder().build();
046
047        /**
048         * Create a minimal person stub attached to the supplied outbreak.
049         *
050         * @param outbreak the owning outbreak
051         * @return a simple modifiable person stub
052         */
053        @Override @JsonIgnore
054        default ModifiablePerson createPersonStub(Outbreak outbreak) {
055                return Person.createPersonStub(outbreak);
056        }
057
058        /**
059         * Draw a relationship strength from the configured distribution.
060         *
061         * @param source  source person (unused in this simple implementation)
062         * @param target  target person (unused)
063         * @param sampler sampler used to draw from the distribution
064         * @return sampled relationship strength
065         */
066        @Override @JsonIgnore
067        default double getRelationshipStrength(
068                        Person source, Person target, Sampler sampler
069        ) {
070                return this.getRelationshipStrengthDistribution().sample(sampler);
071        }
072
073        /**
074         * Default distribution used for relationship strength sampling.
075         *
076         * @return a uniform distribution by default
077         */
078        @Value.Default
079        default Distribution getRelationshipStrengthDistribution() {
080                return SimpleDistribution.uniform();
081        }
082
083}
